hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Hurairah that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:“Any man who dies and has the property of another man, whether he paid something towards it or not, (the owner of those goods) is like any other creditor.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ وَجَدَ مَتَاعَهُ بِعَيْنِهِ عِنْدَ رَجُلٍ قَدْ أَفْلَسَ
chapter.eng-name: One Who finds His Exact Property With A Man Who Has Become Bankrupt
